metadata.title: CVE-2012-6615 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: The ff_ass_split_override_codes function in libavcodec/ass_split.c inFFmpeg before 1.0.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(NULL pointer dereference and crash) via a subtitle dialog without text.

criterions.comment: mythtv package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
vice package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
gst-libav1.0 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
